A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian is a great director but he really dropped the ball on this one. I was 11 when the first one came out so Star Wars has been part of my life for 40 years so I understand the formula. This movie however didn't follow any of the thematic elements that makes a SW movie and it felt really pretentious. I know Rian will probably make a great new trilogy but taking on the Skywalker saga was just too much for him.
